snippet.title: SeaRing - First Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1678880/SeaRing

STAY UP TO DATE: https://linktr.ee/SeaRing

SeaRing is a 2d game halfway between action and puzzle. It has a slightly nostalgic tone to the style, and the gimmick is that the only action the main character has is defensive, rather than offensive. It is based on a simple but lore-heavy story, and a particular sense of humor.
